title: Wager Won
description: It is highly recommended you enjoy Gambled Soul before reading Wager WonNo one expected Amara to kill a god. Most didn't even know it was possible until the earth quaked beneath their feet as the god of creation took her last breath. But despite Amara's best efforts, the balance has been shaken and now the god of deceit, Puck, has the power to create monsters who are thirsty for light and enjoy hunting innocent souls. The only thing standing between him and his final goal of ultimate power is a dagger that can end his life.And his reign.Even though it's been lost for centuries, Amara is determined to find it and take back everything she's lost with the help of Rush, her mentor and....boyfriend? She might've been nothing but a pawn before, but Puck has no idea what she's capable of.The only problem? Neither does she.
author: Kelsie Rae
